  @/@25093
  sname
  moveEditorOnEnter
  stype
  boolean
  sinputtype
  truefalse
  sgroup
  RowSelectionModel
  sdefault
  true
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@
<div class="short">false to turn off moving the editor to the next row down when the enter key is pressed
or the next row up when shift ...
#$@text#$@
  LvalidateOnBlur
  false
  LallowDecimals
  false
  LallowNegative

  sid
  25093
  @/@25094
  sname
  singleSelect
  stype
  boolean
  sinputtype
  truefalse
  sgroup
  RowSelectionModel
  sdefault
  false
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@
<tt>true</tt> to allow selection of only one row at a time (defaults to <tt>false</tt>
allowing multiple selections)
#$@text#$@
  LvalidateOnBlur
  false
  LallowDecimals
  false
  LallowNegative
  false
  sdescriptors
  xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
